trans-unit.resname: NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Card Name
NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·1 | Anhelo, the Painter | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: The first instant or sorcery spell you cast each turn has casualty 2. (As you cast that spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 2 or greater. When you do, copy the spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.)
trans-unit.target: 你每回合施放的第一个瞬间或法术咒语具有催命2。（于你施放该咒语时，你可以牺牲一个力量等于或大于2的生物。当你如此作时，复制该咒语，且你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·2 | Henzie "Toolbox" Torre | Card Name
NCC·2 | Henzie "Toolbox" Torre | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature spell you cast with mana value 4 or greater has blitz. The blitz cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may choose to cast that spell for its blitz cost. If you do, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
trans-unit.target: 每个你施放之法术力值等于或大于4的生物咒语均具有急袭异能。其急袭费用等同于其法术力费用。（你可以选择支付该咒语的急袭费用来施放它。如果你如此作，则它获得敏捷与「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌。」在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它牺牲。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·2 | Henzie "Toolbox" Torre | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Blitz costs you pay cost {1} less for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game.
trans-unit.target: 你本盘游戏中每从统帅区施放过一次你的指挥官，你支付的急袭费用便减少{1}。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·3 | Kamiz, Obscura Oculus | Card Name
NCC·3 | Kamiz, Obscura Oculus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, target attacking creature can't be blocked this turn. It connives. Then choose another attacking creature with lesser power. That creature gains double strike until end of turn. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击的生物本回合不能被阻挡。令其筹谋。然后选择另一个力量小于前者的攻击生物。该生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。（某生物筹谋的流程是抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。如果你弃掉的是非地牌，则在该生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·4 | Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva | Card Name
NCC·4 | Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Kitt Kanto enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token.
trans-unit.target: 当琪特坎托进战场时，派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·4 | Kitt Kanto, Mayhem Diva | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, you may tap two untapped creatures you control. When you do, target creature that player controls gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Goad that creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手回合的战斗开始时，你可以横置两个由你操控且未横置的生物。当你如此作时，直到回合结束，目标由该牌手操控的生物得+2/+2且获得践踏异能。煽惑该生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·5 | Perrie, the Pulverizer | Card Name
NCC·5 | Perrie, the Pulverizer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Perrie enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on target creature. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当佩力进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个后盾指示物。（如果它将受到伤害或将被消灭，则改为从其上移去一个后盾指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·5 | Perrie, the Pulverizer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Perrie attacks, target creature you control gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of different kinds of counters among permanents you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当佩力攻击时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为由你操控之永久物上各指示物的种类数量。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·6 | The Beamtown Bullies | Card Name
NCC·6 | The Beamtown Bullies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·6 | The Beamtown Bullies | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target opponent whose turn it is puts target nonlegendary creature card from your graveyard onto the battlefield under their control. It gains haste. Goad it. At the beginning of the next end step, exile it. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：选择目标轮到此回合的对手和目标在你坟墓场中的非传奇生物牌。该牌手将该生物牌从该处在其操控下放进战场。它获得敏捷异能。煽惑它。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·7 | Kros, Defense Contractor | Card Name
NCC·7 | Kros, Defense Contractor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a shield counter on target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在目标由对手操控的生物上放置一个后盾指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·7 | Kros, Defense Contractor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, tap that creature and goad it. It gains trample until your next turn. (Until your next turn, that creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你在一个不由你操控的生物上放置一个或数个指示物时，横置该生物并煽惑它。它获得践踏异能直到你的下一个回合。（直到你的下一个回合，该生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·8 | Parnesse, the Subtle Brush | Card Name
NCC·8 | Parnesse, the Subtle Brush | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless that player pays 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你或一个由你操控的永久物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付4点生命，否则反击之。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·8 | Parnesse, the Subtle Brush | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you copy a spell, up to one target opponent may also copy that spell. They may choose new targets for that copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当你复制咒语时，至多一位目标对手也可以复制该咒语。他可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·9 | Phabine, Boss's Confidant | Card Name
NCC·9 | Phabine, Boss's Confidant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生生物具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·9 | Phabine, Boss's Confidant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Parley — At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player reveals the top card of their library. For each land card revealed this way, you create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. Then creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each nonland card revealed this way. Then each player draws a card.
trans-unit.target: 论争～在你回合的战斗开始时，每位牌手各展示其牌库顶牌。每以此法展示出一张地牌，你便派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。然后每以此法展示出一张非地牌，由你操控的生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。然后每位牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·10 | Tivit, Seller of Secrets | Card Name
NCC·10 | Tivit, Seller of Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·10 | Tivit, Seller of Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Council's dilemma — Whenever Tivit enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, starting with you, each player votes for evidence or bribery. For each evidence vote, investigate. For each bribery vote, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 议争～每当棣维特进战场或对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，由你开始，每位牌手各投票选择「搜证」或「行贿」。「搜证」每有一票，你便探查一次；「行贿」每有一票，你便派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·10 | Tivit, Seller of Secrets | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: While voting, you may vote an additional time. (The votes can be for different choices or for the same choice.)
trans-unit.target: 投票时你可以额外多投票一次。（可以投票选择不同的选项或相同的选项。）

NCC·11 | Aerial Extortionist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·11 | Aerial Extortionist | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，放逐至多一个目标非地永久物。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，其拥有者可以施放之。

NCC·12 | Angelic Sleuth | Card Text | Paragraph 1

NCC·18 | Master of Ceremonies | Card Text | Paragraph 1

For each player who chose friends, you and that player each create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. For each player who chose secrets, you and that player each draw a card.

trans-unit.resname: NCC·30 | Sinister Concierge | Card Name
NCC·30 | Sinister Concierge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may exile it and put three time counters on it. If you do, exile up to one target creature and put three time counters on it. Each card exiled this way that doesn't have suspend gains suspend. (For each card with suspend, its owner removes a time counter from it at the beginning of their upkeep. When the last is removed, they may cast it without paying its mana cost. Those creature spells have haste.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以放逐它，并在其上放置三个计时指示物。若你如此作，则放逐至多一个目标生物，并在其上放置三个计时指示物。每张以此法放逐且不具延缓异能的牌各获得延缓。（每张具延缓异能的牌均需进行以下流程～在其拥有者的维持开始时，该牌手从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，该牌手施放它，且不需支付其法术力费用。其中的生物咒语具有敏捷异能。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·31 | Skyway Robber | Card Name
NCC·31 | Skyway Robber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·31 | Skyway Robber | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 逸脱～{3}{U}，从你的坟墓场放逐五张其他牌。（你可以从你坟墓场中施放此牌，并支付其逸脱费用。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·31 | Skyway Robber | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME escapes with "Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may cast an artifact, instant, or sorcery spell from among cards exiled with CARDNAME without paying its mana cost."

trans-unit.resname: NCC·32 | Storm of Forms | Card Name
NCC·32 | Storm of Forms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you cast this spell, copy it for each kind of counter among permanents you control. You may choose new targets for the copies.

NCC·34 | Body Count | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spectacle {B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)

trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each creature that died under your control this turn.

NCC·35 | Dogged Detective | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，刺探2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, repeat the following process for each opponent in turn order. Reveal the top card of your library. That player may pay life equal to that card's mana value. If they do, exile that card. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

trans-unit.resname: NCC·86 | Bennie Bracks, Zoologist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if you created a token this turn, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中派出过衍生物，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·87 | Tenuous Truce | Card Name
NCC·87 | Tenuous Truce | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·87 | Tenuous Truce | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of enchanted opponent's end step, you and that player each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在所结附的对手之结束步骤开始时，你和该牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·87 | Tenuous Truce | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When you attack enchanted opponent or a planeswalker they control or when they attack you or a planeswalker you control, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当你攻击所结附的对手或任一由其操控的鹏洛客或当他攻击你或任一由你操控的鹏洛客时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·88 | Swindler's Scheme | Card Name
NCC·88 | Swindler's Scheme | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell from their hand, you may reveal the top card of your library. If it shares a card type with that spell, counter that spell and that opponent may cast the revealed card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一对手从其手上施放咒语时，你可以展示你的牌库顶牌。如果它与该咒语具有共通的牌张类别，则反击该咒语且该对手可以施放所展示的牌，而不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·89 | Mari, the Killing Quill | Card Name
NCC·89 | Mari, the Killing Quill | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it with a hit counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控的生物死去时，将它放逐且上面有一个灭口指示物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·89 | Mari, the Killing Quill | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Assassins, Mercenaries, and Rogues you control have deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may remove a hit counter from a card that player owns in exile. If you do, draw a card and create two Treasure tokens."
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的杀手、佣兵和浪客具有死触与「每当此生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以从放逐区中由该牌手拥有的牌上移去一个灭口指示物。若你如此作，则抓一张牌并派出两个珍宝衍生物。」

trans-unit.resname: NCC·90 | Spiteful Repossession | Card Name
NCC·90 | Spiteful Repossession | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME向每位操控的地比你多之对手各造成伤害，其数量为「你与他之间地数量的差距」。然后你派出等同于以此法造成伤害之数量的珍宝衍生物。

NCC·103 | Kamiz, Obscura Oculus | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: NCC·118 | Jailbreak | Card Name
NCC·118 | Jailbreak | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target permanent card in an opponent's graveyard to the battlefield under their control. When that permanent enters the battlefield, return up to one target permanent card with equal or lesser mana value from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 将目标永久物牌在任一对手的操控下从其坟墓场移回战场。当该永久物进战场时，将至多一张目标法术力费用等于或小于前者的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·119 | Master of Ceremonies | Card Name
NCC·119 | Master of Ceremonies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent chooses money, friends, or secrets. For each player who chose money, you and that player each create a Treasure token. For each player who chose friends, you and that player each create a 1/1 green and white Citizen creature token. For each player who chose secrets, you and that player each draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位对手各选择「金钱」、「朋友」或「秘密」。对每位选择「金钱」的牌手而言，你和该牌手各派出一个珍宝衍生物。对每位选择「朋友」的牌手而言，你和该牌手各派出一个1/1，绿白双色的市民衍生生物。对每位选择「秘密」的牌手而言，你和该牌手各抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·120 | Resourceful Defense | Card Name
NCC·120 | Resourceful Defense | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a permanent you control leaves the battlefield, if it had counters on it, put those counters on target permanent you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的永久物离开战场时，若其上有指示物，则将这些指示物放置在目标由你操控的永久物上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·120 | Resourceful Defense | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {4}{W}: Move any number of counters from target permanent you control to another target permanent you control.
trans-unit.target: {4}{W}：将目标由你操控之永久物上任意数量的指示物移到另一个目标由你操控的永久物上。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·121 | Skyboon Evangelist | Card Name
NCC·121 | Skyboon Evangelist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·121 | Skyboon Evangelist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, support 6. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to six other target creatures.)

trans-unit.resname: NCC·121 | Skyboon Evangelist | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with a counter on it attacks one of your opponents, that creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个其上有指示物的生物攻击你的任一对手时，该生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·122 | Smuggler's Share | Card Name
NCC·122 | Smuggler's Share | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card for each opponent who drew two or more cards this turn, then create a Treasure token for each opponent who had two or more lands enter the battlefield under their control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，每有一位本回合中抓过两张或更多牌的对手，你便抓一张牌，然后每有一位本回合中有两张或更多地在其操控下进战场的对手，你便派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·123 | Aven Courier | Card Name
NCC·123 | Aven Courier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·123 | Aven Courier | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, choose a counter on a permanent you control. Put a counter of that kind on target permanent you control if it doesn't have a counter of that kind on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，选择一个由你操控之永久物上的指示物。如果目标由你操控的永久物上没有该种类的指示物，便在其上放置一个。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·124 | Cephalid Facetaker | Card Name
NCC·124 | Cephalid Facetaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·124 | Cephalid Facetaker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have CARDNAME become a copy of another target creature until end of turn, except it's 1/4 and has "This creature can't be blocked."
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以使CARDNAME成为另一个目标生物的复制品直到回合结束，但它是1/4，且具有「此生物不能被阻挡。」

trans-unit.resname: NCC·125 | Change of Plans | Card Name
NCC·125 | Change of Plans | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each of X target creatures you control connive. You may have any number of them phase out. (To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. Treat phased-out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don't exist until their controller's next turn.)
trans-unit.target: 选择X个目标由你操控的生物。令其分别筹谋。你可以使其中的任意数量跃离。

NCC·126 | Extravagant Replication | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为另一个目标由你操控的非地永久物之复制品。

NCC·127 | Flawless Forgery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Casualty 3 (As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power 3 or greater. When you do, copy this spell and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

trans-unit.resname: NCC·127 | Flawless Forgery | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物，鹏洛客或线索

trans-unit.resname: NCC·128 | In Too Deep | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: 所结附的永久物是无色线索神器，且具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」，并失去所有其他异能。（它不再是生物或鹏洛客。）

trans-unit.resname: NCC·129 | Mask of the Schemer | Card Name
NCC·129 | Mask of the Schemer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, it connives X, where X is the amount of damage it dealt to that player. (Draw X cards, then discard X cards. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each nonland card discarded this way.)
trans-unit.target: 每当佩带此武具的生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，令它筹谋X，X为它对该牌手造成的伤害数量。

NCC·130 | Shield Broker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, put a shield counter on target noncommander creature you don't control. You gain control of that creature for as long as it has a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，在目标不由你操控的非指挥官生物上放置一个后盾指示物。于该生物上有后盾指示物的时段内，你获得其操控权。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·131 | Sinister Concierge | Card Name
NCC·131 | Sinister Concierge | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may exile it and put three time counters on it. If you do, exile up to one target creature and put three time counters on it. Each card exiled this way that doesn't have suspend gains suspend. (For each card with suspend, its owner removes a time counter from it at the beginning of their upkeep. When the last is removed, they may cast it without paying its mana cost. Those creature spells have haste.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，你可以放逐它，并在其上放置三个计时指示物。若你如此作，则放逐至多一个目标生物，并在其上放置三个计时指示物。每张以此法放逐且不具延缓异能的牌各获得延缓。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·132 | Skyway Robber | Card Name
NCC·132 | Skyway Robber | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·132 | Skyway Robber | Card Text | Paragraph 2

NCC·136 | Dogged Detective | Card Text | Paragraph 1

NCC·138 | Make an Example | Card Text | Paragraph 1

NCC·139 | Misfortune Teller | Card Text | Paragraph 1
NCC·139 | Misfortune Teller | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or deals combat damage to a player, exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, create a 2/2 black Rogue creature token. If it was a land card, create a Treasure token. Otherwise, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，将目标牌从坟墓场放逐。若它是生物牌，则你派出一个2/2黑色浪客衍生生物。若它是地牌，则你派出一个珍宝衍生物。若以上皆非，则你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: NCC·140 | Protection Racket | Card Name
NCC·140 | Protection Racket | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, repeat the following process for each opponent in turn order. Reveal the top card of your library. That player may pay life equal to that card's mana value. If they do, exile that card. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

NCC·149 | Mezzio Mugger | Card Text | Paragraph 1

NCC·151 | Rose Room Treasurer | Card Text | Paragraph 1

NCC·152 | Seize the Spotlight | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: SNC·310 | Hostile Takeover | Card Name
SNC·310 | Hostile Takeover | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature has base power and toughness 4/4 until end of turn. Then CARDNAME deals 3 damage to each creature.
trans-unit.target: 至多一个目标生物的基础力量与防御力为1/1直到回合结束。至多另一个目标生物的基础力量与防御力为4/4直到回合结束。然后CARDNAME对所有生物各造成3点伤害。

SNC·311 | Incandescent Aria | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个非衍生物的生物各造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·312 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Name
SNC·312 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and have vigilance as long as you control three or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控三个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便得+1/+0且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·312 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have trample as long as you control six or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控六个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便再得+1/+0且具有践踏异能。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·312 | Jetmir, Nexus of Revels | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control also get +1/+0 and have double strike as long as you control nine or more creatures.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控九个或更多生物，由你操控的生物便再得+1/+0且具有连击异能。

SNC·313 | Jinnie Fay, Jetmir's Second | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 如果你将派出一个或数个衍生物，则你可以改为派出等量的2/2绿色、具敏捷异能的猫衍生生物或等量的3/1绿色、具警戒异能的狗衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: SNC·314 | Lagrella, the Magpie | Card Name
SNC·314 | Lagrella, the Magpie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile any number of other target creatures controlled by different players until Lagrella leaves the battlefield. When an exiled card enters the battlefield under your control this way, put two +1/+1 counters on it.

SNC·435 | Corpse Explosion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile a creature card from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物和每个鹏洛客各造成伤害，其数量等同于所放逐之牌的力量。

SNC·436 | Meeting of the Five | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top ten cards of your library. You may cast spells with exactly three colors from among them this turn. Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast spells with exactly three colors.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的十张牌。本回合中，你可以从其中施放正好为三色的咒语。加{W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}。此法术力只能用来施放正好为三色的咒语。
